article.name: Is it possible to monitor environments other than IDCF with the IDCF plan?
article.title: Is it possible to monitor environments other than IDCF with the IDCF plan?
article.body:
• The IDCF special plan is specifically for monitoring IDCF cloud environments.
  • For this reason, monitoring other cloud environments etc. in organizations that fall under this plan is prohibited.
  • If you would like to monitor other cloud environments, you can do so in an organization of a regular plan (Free / Standard) created separately.
  • Please make sure to retire all hosts other than those of IDCF cloud environments.
